text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for content creation and gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1050. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The speakers is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the HIDevolution ASUS ROG Strix GL503GE Scar Edition 15.6” FHD 120Hz Gaming Laptop | 2.2 GHz i7-8750H, GTX 1050TI, 8GB DDR4/2666MHz RAM, 1TB SSHD | Authorized Performance Upgrades & Warranty!
